data.title: Clarks Originals Shoe Collections & Collaborations
data.meta_description: Clarks' collaborations give footwear fashion the limelight it deserves. A Clarks' shoe collaboration can be anything from the creation of a limited edition Wallabee to fully-fledged, brand new shoe collections.
data.text:
8th St by Ronnie Fieg

A Clarks collaborator for more than a decade, American visionary Fieg's footwear journey began back in the mid-nineties via the David Z shoe store on Manhattan's 8th St. From unassuming beginnings to sought-after designer – today, Fieg is one of the most respected names in the industry.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Wallabee Day

With its unprecedented foot-shaped toe, true moccasin construction and spongy natural crepe sole, the Wallabee, as with all Clarks shoes, was created with ultimate comfort in mind. But what has taken this shoe from its humble Somerset beginnings to its iconic status on the world stage are the communities that have adopted, adapted, and embraced the shoe.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Sunset: A Clarks and Manchester Film

Sunset: Manchester - a love letter to the rave, set now and then - joining the dots between the past and the present, the intangible things that will always be present as well as those elements that are always authentic in the scene like Clarks.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Liam Gallagher x Clarks Originals

A contemporary update on a forgotten classic, remembered by a legend. When it came to the revival of a cult Clarks design, the Rambler, there was only one man to collaborate with: fellow icon and Clarks Originals aficionado Liam Gallagher.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Popcaan For Clarks Originals

Unruly - in music and style. Never one to fit into the mould, Jamaican-born dancehall artist Popcaan brings his off-beat sensibility to Clarks Originals in a box-fresh collaboration.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Clarks Originals X Vandy The Pink

For our second collaboration with Vandy The Pink, our iconic Wallabee Boot is reimagined as a burger. Fun, whimsical and full of considered detailing, the new hero style taps fully into the designer’s experimental approach to footwear.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Jorja Smith for Clarks Originals

Real. Above all else. Lyrics that resonate, a voice with soul, and iconic style that speaks volumes – we've collaborated with amazing British singer-songwriter Jorja Smith to bring her creative influence to Clarks Originals for a brand-new silhouette inspired by our iconic Desert Nomad.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Clarks and New York: Soles of the City

Clarks Originals celebrates its connection to New York City with the release of a short film titled, “Clarks and New York - Soles of the City,” which explores the rich and meaningful relationship between the brand’s iconic Wallabee and the cultural fabric of New York over the past fifty years.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Clarks & Dancehall

Our shoes might have been born at our Somerset headquarters, but our roots are more global than that. Since the original Desert Boot set foot in Jamaica in the mid-20th century, our soles have accrued cult status year after year. Today, they’re the go-to shoe of the island nation.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Clarks Originals X Mayde

Born and raised in LA, Aleali May is an established name on the global fashion scene. A designer, model, stylist and self-professed sneaker enthusiast, Aleali May is one of the first women to make waves in the streetwear industry – her exclusive collaborations have been an instant success, with collections selling out in minutes.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Clarks Originals x Daniëlle Cathari

Daniëlle Cathari’s first collaboration with Clarks Originals sees the immediately recognisable Wallabee reimagined in fresh textures and shades for versatile styling. Known for her playful femininity and subversive spirit, the renowned Dutch designer enhances our icon with asymmetric uppers in smooth and fuzzy suedes – all sourced from the same family-run tannery we’ve been partnered with for decades.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Salehe Bembury x Clarks Originals

Salehe Bembury needs no introduction. Starting out with Payless Shoes® back in 2009, the American footwear designer went on to hit the big time with a roster of work that boasts some of the biggest brand names in the world.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Clarks Originals: Beyond Worlds

In May 2023 Clarks partnered with Empire Music, giving fans the chance to enjoy a spectacular concert with acclaimed Afrobeats artist Fireboy DML. His footwear of choice? The Clarks Wallabee.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Raheem Sterling x Clarks Originals

Recognised worldwide, Raheem Sterling is widely acknowledged as one of the finest footballers of his generation. Born in Jamaica, with its rich cultural heritage playing a hugely important role in his life, it’s these roots that led to Raheem’s love of Clarks Originals.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)

Desert Trek - 50 Years of Trekking

We’ve been trekking for 50 years, and look how far we’ve come. The Desert Trek is a keystone of Clarks’ design language and heritage, and we’ve faithfully recreated it for its 50th anniversary.

Discover More(opens in a new tab)
